page.title: 06LOWER REDCAR FARM.
page.content:
ACREAGE-150 TYPE-DAIRY. TENURE-OWNER OCCUPIED. DAIRY CATTLE-60 TO 70. OTHER CATTLE-65. SHEEP-220. LANDUSE-GRAZING/SILAGE/HAY/MOORLAND.
Lower Redcar Farm is a typical farm for this area.The majority are dairy or beef cattle farms as crop farming is impossible as the climate and relief are not suitable.Most of the surrounding area is at 900ft above sea level or higher. The cows are fed on cattle cake, which is delivered in bulk.Other products such as fertilisers and sugar beet are also delivered in bulk.
